## M365TenantCredential class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Represent Microsoft 365 tenant identity, and it is usually used when user is not involved like time-triggered automation job.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class M365TenantCredential implements TokenCredential 
```
<b>Implements:</b> TokenCredential

## Remarks

Can only be used in server side code.

## Example


```typescript
loadConfiguration(); // load configuration from environment variables
const credential = new M365TenantCredential();

```
